issue.title: [R] [Docs] Clean up docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13551](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13551). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are a bunch of docs that need to be regenerated —  let's clean them all up in one commit + make sure pkgdown is fine, etc.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13551?focusedCommentId=17415508) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
This seems no longer to be a problem but feel free to reopen if I'm missing something
